0: Chris Cornell Suicide Scene Revealed in Police Photos NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Chris Cornell's Death, Police Release Hotel Room Photos NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR EXCLUSIVE NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR When police entered Chris Cornell's Detroit hotel room they found his belongings, his prescriptions ... and the exercise apparatus he used to commit suicide. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Detroit PD just released the photos they took of the room during their investigation, and they reveal the bathroom scene where Chris died. The exercise band he rigged on the bathroom door was on the floor, surrounded by a streak of blood. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR There were 3 prescription bottles -- prednisone
